column1: Smoque BBQ////The greatest BBQ in all the land.  Also
column2: great service.  I like how they seat you where it works out the best for all patrons.  It gets around one of my all-time pet peeves - people who 'save' seat s while their friends are in line for food.  People!  In the time that it takes your friend to order and get food
column3: an entire other party could have eaten at the table you're saving.  You're messing up the flow!
